caption.center: STEVE TATAII, Plaintiff-Appellant v. MIKE GABBARD; ALLIANCE FOR
TRADITIONAL MARRIAGE AND VALUES (FORMERLY KNOWN AS "ATM" OR ALLIANCE FOR

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE FIRST CIRCUIT COURT (CIV. NO. 00-1-3334)
opinion.opinion_byline: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON, NAKAYAMA, RAMIL, and ACOBA, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Upon consideration of Plaintiff-Appellant Steve Tataii's motion for reconsideration of the order dismissing the appeal and the record,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration is denied.
